name: stock_get_key_statistics_data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yh_finance_v2.
Tool description: 
API description: Gets key statistics data for a given stock symbol and region using the RapidAPI service.

symbol.description: Ticker Symbol ( Ex. \\\\"AAPL\\\\" is Ticker symbol for Apple Inc. on the stock market )

region.description: The region for the stock market. Default is 'US'. Allowed values are 'US', 'BR', 'AU', 'CA', 'FR', 'DE', 'HK', 'IN', 'IT', 'ES', 'GB', 'S'.
